```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import ndtri, ndtr
>>> cdf_val = ndtr(2)
>>> cdf_val
0.9772498680518208 
```

```py
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x = np.linspace(0.01, 1, 200)
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> ax.plot(x, ndtri(x))
>>> ax.set_title("Standard normal percentile function")
>>> plt.show() 
```
